# Example repository for GitHub

This is an example repository for GitHub.  

We will work with the files in the repo today. For this, download the data and code from this repository under the code section (download ZIP).

---
# Gitignore
I case you couldn't overwrite the default, copy this into the .gitignore (overwrite) in Rstudio.

# Gitignore
## Root directory
## ignore files generated by R when setting up a project in the git repository
/*.Rproj.user
/*.Rhistory
/*.RData
/*.Ruserdata
/*.Rproj
.Rproj.user

## Code directory
## ignore any junk created in code folder generated by Rstudio
code/*.rds
code/*.Rdata
code/*.RData
code/*.Rhistory
code/*.Rproj.user
code/*.Rproj

## including files generated by caching a knitted markdown
code/*.rdb
code/*.rdx

## Data directory
## ignore data folder, except for *.md (used for additional metadata documentation)
data/raw_data/*

## you can also ignore data/processed_data/*
